description: nearly flat foot; cylindrical shaped, with shoulder near mouth; long, nearly straight spout; double intertwined handle; cover has knob shaped like pinecone with red leaves; red and gold eagle on each side; for the American market
markings: on underside, in black, on tape: [Chinese c.1784 / (illegible) / coat of Arms of USA] and [4007 / China Export]
title: Teapot
